sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from 'react'; import CharOptions from './CharOptions' class CharStatus extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.updateStatus = this.updateStatus.bind(this); this.state = { str: "", con: "", pow: "", dex: "", app: "", siz: "", int: "", edu: "", hp: "", mp: "", san: "", idea: "", luck: "", knowledge: "", o_str: "", o_con: "", o_pow: "", o_dex: "", o_app: "", o_siz: "", o_int: "", o_edu: "", o_hp: "", o_mp: "", o_san: "", o_idea: "", o_luck: "", o_knowledge: "", t_str: "", t_con: "", t_pow: "", t_dex: "", t_app: "", t_siz: "", t_int: "", t_edu: "", t_hp: "", t_mp: "", t_san: "", t_idea: "", t_luck: "", t_knowledge: "", f_str: "", f_con: "", f_pow: "", f_dex: "", f_app: "", f_siz: "", f_int: "", f_edu: "", f_hp: "", f_mp: "", f_san: "", f_idea: "", f_luck: "", f_knowledge: "" } } getStatus = (n, m, l) => { let sum = 0; for (let i = 1; i <= n; i++) { sum += Math.floor(Math.random() * m) + 1; } sum += l; return sum; } getAllStatus = () => { this.setState({ str: this.getStatus(3, 6, 0), con: this.getStatus(3, 6, 0), pow: this.getStatus(3, 6, 0), dex: this.getStatus(3, 6, 0), app: this.getStatus(3, 6, 0), siz: this.getStatus(2, 6, 6), int: this.getStatus(2, 6, 6), edu: this.getStatus(3, 6, 3), }, () => { this.setState({ f_str: str, f_con: con, f_pow: pow, f_dex: dex, f_app: app, f_siz: siz, f_int, int, f_edu, edu }, () => { this.updateCalculatedStatus(); }) }) } updateCalculatedStatus = () => { this.setState({ hp: Math.ceil((parseInt(this.state.con)+parseInt(this.state.siz))/2), mp: this.state.pow, san: this.state.pow*5, idea: this.state.int*5, luck: this.state.pow*5, knowledge: this.state.edu*5 }) } updateOtherStatus = (e) => { const otherStatusName = e.target.id; const statusName = e.target.id.slice(2); const finalStatusName = "f_" + statusName this.setState({ [e.target.id]: e.target.value }, () => { this.setState({ [finalStatusName]: parseInt(this.state[statusName]) + parseInt(this.state[otherStatusName]) }, () => { console.log(this.state); this.updateCalculatedStatus(); }) }) } updateStatus = (statusName, statusValue) => { this.setState({ [statusName]: statusValue }, () => { this.updateCalculatedStatus(); }) } render(){ return(
STR CON POW DEX APP SIZ INT EDU HP MP SAN
) } } export default CharStatus;
